message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?
